name: Star Boost
description:
Made by STAR FORGE for the GMTK Jam 2017
Everything was created within 48 hours.

In this game you can't jump, you can only use your gun to blast yourself away from the ground. For best experience we recommend downloading the game.

NOTE: should you get stuck anywhere,  you can restart the level you're playing by pressing R.

NOTE: there's no sound or vfx indicating that you lost HP, only the HP counter (in the middle or top-right corner of the screen)

NOTE: the little ding sounds you hear indicate that your gun was reloaded, it can hold up to 3 bullets, and reloads however many you still need when you're on the ground.
